attributes.action: Encourage Cannock chase council to invest in Rugeley and other areas.
attributes.background: We want fair treatment from Cannock Chase Council, we feel the local council as over looked Rugeley and other communities in the area, and as received very little investment over many years, all investment seems to be focused on facilities & the encouragement of businesses to the Cannock town area.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. Spending decisions relating to council funds, including decisions on which local areas to invest in, are the responsibility of your local council. 

You could also raise your issue with a local councillor, who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them:

https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
